This is just a regular, run-of-the-mill Chicken. It's been quite a while since they were last seen alive, and the passing of time has not been kind; for the Chicken forgot how to bear and lay the Egg. For better or worse, this event is not as tragic as it is annoying.
Lay Item: Feathers!
Shown above: a regular Chicken. May sporadically change its colour.
